resources.string: Press to enter text to encrypt.
Oups, a password is required to initialize the token! Please enter a password:
Oups! Something went wrong with the application. Please try reseting your password. If the problem persists, reinstall the application.

Encryptor/Decryptor is an application that provides an AES encryption and decryption.

How to operate:

1. Switch on the application by pressing the Power button.

2. If first time, enter a password to the dialog shown.

3. Click the monitor to enter a text to be encrypted and then press the encrypt button to show the results. The encrypted data can be decrypted by pressing the decrypt button.

4. Press the Power button to switch off the application.

5. To reset the password and set a new one, press the button on the right next to the Power button.
A new password will replace the one used to initialize the token. Please enter a password:
Please enter the text to be encrypted/decrypted:

OTP (One-Time Password) generator

Version: 1.0

Company: Qualcomm Technologies, Inc.
